name: The Unity Mobile Adventure Game
blurb: A positive Mobile Adventure Game focusing on building a community which is dedicated to helping others and doing good in society

rewards.reward: $5 of in-game currency and you'll receive advance notification when the game is available for download so you can be among the first to play!

$10 of in-game currency, advance notification when the game is available, plus your name listed in the game credits and a digital download Strategy Guide to give you the best route to achieving up to Level 10 adventures.

Same as $10 contribution, but you get $25 worth of in-game currency, plus a digital download of an original art print made featuring "Thank You For Helping Build The Christian Unity Game" (suitable for printing and framing). In addition you will also receive a digital download Strategy Guide to give you the best route to achieving up to Level 20 adventures

Same as $25 contribution, plus a digital download of another original art print with a \u201cthank you\u201d personalized to you or your business (suitable for printing and framing), and an embroidered \u201cChristian Unity\u201d baseball cap, You will also receive a digital download Strategy Guide to give you the best route to achieving up to Level 30 adventures (Donors outside the U.S. please add an additional $10 to your pledge for International shipping).

Same as $50 contribution plus an exclusive limited edition \u201dUnity Game\u201d embroidered polo shirt. Everyone donating at or above this level will be granted access to the The Unity Game Designer's Facebook Group where you can interact with the designers, make suggestions, get updates on progress, etc. You will also receive a digital download Strategy Guide to give you the best route to achieving up to Level 40 adventures (Donors outside the U.S. please add an additional $10 to your pledge for International shipping).

Same as $100 contribution plus a separate, limited-edition physical print proclaiming \u201cI Helped Build the Christian Unity Game\u201d and signed by the design team, this will look great hanging in your home, office or Church! (Donors outside the U.S. please add an additional $15 to your pledge for International shipping)

Same as $250 contribution plus Be a part of our design focus group and the first to play Christian Unity; we will provision your iPhone with the game so you can play it and give us your feedback to help us make the best game experience possible. You will be listed in our \u201cDesigners Group\u201d section in the game credits. (only 20 available - Donors outside the U.S. please add an additional $15 to your pledge for International shipping)

Same as $250 contribution, plus you'll have a property in the game named after you or your business, church, etc. Properties include things like Airlines, Recording Studios, Radio Stations, even a Cathedral! (only 20 available - Donors outside the U.S. please add an additional $15 to your pledge for International shipping)

Same as $250 contribution, plus a personal talk from the design team; two members of our team will come to your company/office/place for a personal meet and greet, and we\u2019ll give a talk about Unity, from concept to finish, as well as the power of community and its role in success. (only 4 available - Donors outside the U.S. please add an additional $15 to your pledge for International shipping - airfare and accommodations to be covered separately - personal appearances are available from June 1st, 2012 through December 16th, 2012)
